mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET hate = hate + #{value} WHERE reply_id = #{replyId}
UPDATE reply SET nested_count = nested_count + #{value} WHERE reply_id = #{replyId}
mapper.select: SELECT reply_id, contents_id, attached_id, channel_id, `comment`, `like`, hate, `date`, nested_count, `name`, `profile` FROM reply NATURAL JOIN CHANNEL WHERE attached_id = #{contentsId};
